articles.title: Ricky Martin Has Responded To Claims That He He Had A Sexual Relationship With His Nephew
articles.description: Ricky responded in a statement via his lawyer.
articles.content:
Steve Granitz / WireImage
This falls on the heels of Martin being sued by his former manager, Rebecca Drucker, for $3 million for unpaid "substantial commissions," according to Deadline.
